title: Application For Botswana Blue Card

description.short: An application for a Botswana Blue Card, a document for foreign nationals to establish their legal residence in Botswana.
description.long: This is an application for a Botswana Blue Card, a document designed for foreign nationals to establish their legal residence in Botswana. The Blue Card serves as proof of their eligibility to reside and work in the country.

ministry: Ministry of Labour and Home Affairs
department: Department of Labour and Social Security

fields.description: Enter your previous omangID or passport
Enter place of birth(where you were born)
Select highest  Qualification from the list
Enter date of expiry of your passport
Enter your next of kin surname
Enter your next of kin firstname
Whats your relation to your next of kin

fields.tooltip: Please upload a covering letter from the Applicant
Please upload 2 coloured passport size photos

fields.fieldLabel: Copies of documents evidencing prior Botswana Citizenship or expired Omang
fields.tooltip: Please upload copies of documents evidencing prior Botswana Citizenship or expired Omang
Please upload a certified copy of acquired citizenship
Please upload a certified copy of the applicant’s passport
Please upload the parent’s proof of citizenship (where necessary)

fields.fieldLabel: Certified copy of Unabridged birth certificate
fields.tooltip: Please upload a certified copy of the Unabridged birth certificate

fields.description: I hereby declare that the information provided by me in this application is true, correct, and complete to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any incorrect, misleading, or untrue information or withholding of any relevant information may affect the issuance of the Botswana Blue card or result in the revocation of the Blue Card.
